data.name: Apocalypse Nerds
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

YouTube survival experts Kaduche and Wynn have been planning for the end of the world their whole lives. When they discover it could actually occur, they team up with their rival survival expert and bang on the door of their teacher to join forces to stop the pending destruction. Unfortunately, the actual cause of the scare is much closer than expected, and their very heroic aspirations are the folly of the real danger just under their noses. Will they be able to stop what they helped start before all humanity is wiped out?
data.about_the_game: YouTube survival experts Kaduche and Wynn have been planning for the end of the world their whole lives. When they discover it could actually occur, they team up with their rival survival expert and bang on the door of their teacher to join forces to stop the pending destruction. Unfortunately, the actual cause of the scare is much closer than expected, and their very heroic aspirations are the folly of the real danger just under their noses. Will they be able to stop what they helped start before all humanity is wiped out?
data.short_description: 2 YouTube survival “experts” are ready for the end of the world. When they discover it could actually occur, they team up with their rival to stop the end. But, the actual cause of the scare is much closer than expected, and their very actions are the folly of the real danger just under their noses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.

Minimum:

  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
